meanings.definition: The quality of being loyal, reliable, and hardworking.
meanings.sent1: Her stalwartnesses in completing tasks on time earned her the Employee of the Month award.
meanings.sent2: The team's stalwartnesses during the project ensured its success.
meanings.sent3: Even though he was tired, his stalwartnesses in helping his friend move did not go unnoticed.
meanings.sent4: The stalwartnesses of the old lighthouse guided ships safely through the stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The knight's stalwartnesses in defending the kingdom were legendary.

meanings.definition: The state of being strong and brave in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent1: Despite the challenges, her stalwartnesses never wavered.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers showed great stalwartnesses in battle.
meanings.sent3: The cat's stalwartnesses in facing the vacuum cleaner were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His stalwartnesses in overcoming his fear of heights were truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The mountain climber's stalwartnesses led him to conquer the highest peaks.
